title: Non-aural set, minuet trio - mm 1-4 progression

content.question: The harmonic progression in measures 1â€“4 is best analyzed as

choices.label: Option A shows roman numerals for a chord progression of four chords. Option A shows major 1, minor 6, major 5 6, and major 1.
Option B shows roman numerals for a chord progression of four chords. Option B shows major 1, major 5 7, minor 7 half diminished 7, and major 1.
Option C shows roman numerals for a chord progression of four chords. Option C shows major 1, minor 2 4 2, major 5 6 5, and major 1.
Option D shows roman numerals for a chord progression of four chords. Option D shows major 1, major 4 6 4, major 5 7, and major 1.

content.answer: Option C shows roman numerals for a chord progression of four chords. Option C shows major 1, minor 2 4 2, major 5 6 5, and major 1.
